response.homeDescription:
Incredible value for this spacious townhome that live like a single-family home! This property feels huge with a generous 2,569 sq. ft. finished living space. The home offers 4 beds and 4 baths. Great open floor plan with main level living/family room, and large dining room that opens to beautiful renovated kitchen with stainless appliances and slab countertops. The upper level offers a master suite with ensuite bathroom and great closet space. The upper level has 2 additional bedrooms for a total of 3 beds on one level. The basement is finished with large media/family room, bathroom and 4th bed that is non-confirming. There is an oversized 2-car garage and large patio outdoor space off of the dining room and kitchen. Newer windows, newer exterior pain, and updates throughout the home. Killer opportunity!
This home is not yet in the MLS, but will be soon. Contact Ryan Carter at 303-332-3611 or ryan.carter@8z.com for more information. We welcome other agents!
